price: 30. Le Messager dit : « Seigneur ! Mon peuple fait de ce Coran bien peu de cas (et s’en détourne.) »
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوۡمِي ٱتَّخَذُواْ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مَهۡجُورٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqāla al-rasūlu yārabbi inna qawmī ittakhadhū hādhā al-qur'āna mahjūran
